item.title: Switch Mode Power Supplies Online Resources
item.description: This is a curated list of internet resorces that I think are really useful when it comes to matters relating Switch Mode Power Supplies and low level electronics. Websites DiodeGoneWild - Youtube Channel TroubleShooting and Reparing SMPS Ken Shirrif’s Blog TubeTimeUS EvilMadScientist Books & Manuals TroubleShooting and Reparing SMPS Switchmode Power Supply Handbook Back to work :-)
